data.eml:eml: An illustrated key to the genera and subgenera of the Alysiini (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae), with three genera new for China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhu, Jia-Chen, Achterberg, Cornelis van, Chen, Xue-Xin (2017): An illustrated key to the genera and subgenera of the Alysiini (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae), with three genera new for China. ZooKeys 722: 37-79, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.722.14799, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.722.14799
